com.thoughtworks.selenium.condition

接口 ConditionRunner

  • 所有已知实现类:
    DefaultConditionRunner, JUnit4AndTestNgConditionRunner, JUnitConditionRunner

    public interface ConditionRunner
    A ConditionRunner is a class that can execute a Condition, which need certain basic pieces that it needs to execute (e.g. an instance of Selenium). This is achieved through the ConditionRunner.Context interface.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static interface  ConditionRunner.Context
      Used by implementations of waitFor(Condition) to provide context to the isTrue(com.google.testing.selenium.condition.ConditionRunner.Context) method

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void waitFor(Condition condition)
      This method will, every so often, evaluate the given condition's Condition.isTrue(ConditionRunner.Context) method, until: it becomes true, in which case it simply returns a certain amount of time is passed, in which case it fails by throwing an failure exception tailored to a given test framework -- e.g.
      void waitFor(String narrative, Condition condition)
      As above but with an additional 'should' phrase narrative used in the event of the condition failing to become true

    • 方法详细资料

      • waitFor

        void waitFor(Condition condition)
        This method will, every so often, evaluate the given condition's Condition.isTrue(ConditionRunner.Context) method, until:
        • it becomes true, in which case it simply returns
        • a certain amount of time is passed, in which case it fails by throwing an failure exception tailored to a given test framework -- e.g. AssertionFailedError in the case of JUnit
        • it throws an exception, in which case that is wrapped inside a RuntimeException and rethrown

        How often if "every so often" and how long is the "certain amount of time" is left to the specific implementations of this interface.

        参数:
        condition - condition

      • waitFor

        void waitFor(String narrative,
             Condition condition)
        As above but with an additional 'should' phrase narrative used in the event of the condition failing to become true
        参数:
        condition - condition
        narrative - narrative
